name: Dagon's Harbor
description:
Dagon's Harbour is a short prototype for Windows.

Explore the area, follow the townsfolk.

The Dagon's Harbour prototype was developed by:

Kieran Lewis: Lead Gameplay and UI Programmer, Scripted Sequence Programming, Additional Level Design, 

jkelly: Game Design, Level Design, Narrative Design, Additional Programming, Build Engineer

Minimum system requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or better

HDD: 2.58 GB free space

RAM: 8 GB

VRAM: 6 GB
